Author: known
Content: A smart thief may exploit a bug (buffer overflow etc) in closed source banking software system and siphon away funds. This may continue till someone from the bank or the software company notices this bug.

Author: hopeless
Content: I installed it yesterday (on Windows) and there's a big fat "Install Glassfish v3 Prelude" checkbox on one of the first pages. Unticking this should work for you. I'll give you the benefit of the doubt 'cos perhaps the *nix installer is very different

Author: hopeless
Content: Because Mechanical Turk only allows U.S. residents to set tasks (although the rest of the world can work on them).  Feedback Army seems to get around that inconvenience.
